data.title: BEST RATES at our Hotel in Newport Oregon
data.meta_description: Located in Newport, Oregon our Moolack Shores Inn is within walking distance of Agate Beach Golf Course, historic Newport Bayfront, and Newport Performing Arts Center.
data.text:
Welcome To Moolack Shores Inn

Moolack Shores Inn is ideally located on 101 North Coast Highway, mere steps from the Pacific Ocean in Newport, Oregon. Newport boasts some of Oregon’s best craft breweries, restaurants, and beaches, and attracts visitors year-round with its temperate weather and spectacular beauty. Newport is located approximately an hour from the Eugene Airport and 2 ½ hours from the Portland International Airport.

Services to Ensure Your Comfort

Our 100% smoke-free and pet-free themed guest rooms feature sweeping ocean views, complimentary WIFI, flat-screen TVs, refrigerators, microwaves, coffee makers, daily housekeeping, and in select rooms private decks and fireplaces.

We offer complimentary coffee and snacks in the lobby. And a beautiful firepit and grilling area for your use. We also pride ourselves on having a friendly and helpful front desk staff, ready to assist you with any needs while you are on the property.

Things To Do In Newport Oregon

Moolack Shores Inn is steps from Moolack Beach and offers a private staircase from the Inn to the beach. Because the Inn is on a cliff overlooking the beach, you’ll enjoy magnificent ocean views throughout your stay. Our location provides guests convenient access to local favorites like the Oregon Coast Aquarium, Yaquina Bay Lighthouse, Devil’s Punchbowl State Park, Depoe Bay, Agate Beach, and the historic Newport Bayfront.
